articles.title: New species of stegosaur identified in China - ecns
articles.description: Chinese and British paleontologists have identified a new species of stegosaur from China, the oldest stegosaur ever found in Asia and one of the earliest unearthed anywhere in the world.
articles.content:

articles.title: Grab shares crash as revenue plunges on promotions, driver incentives - Reuters
articles.description: Shares in Grab tumbled 37% on Thursday after Southeast Asia's no. 1 ride-hailing and food delivery firm posted a $1.1 billion quarterly loss and a worse-than-expected drop in revenue, hit by promotional offers and higher driver incentives.
